title: Affliction
description: Some zombies are raised. Others must be put down. Just ask me, Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter.Before now, I figured I could handle them Before now, she would have considered them merely off-putting, never dangerous. Before now, I had never heard of any of them causing human beings to perish in agony. But that’s all changed.These creatures hunt in daylight, and are as fast and strong as vampires. If they bite you, you become just like them. And round and round it goes…Where will it stop? Even I don’t know.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton
